Class QandAPage

java.lang.Object
application.QandAPage
public class QandAPage extends Object
This page handles all Question and Answer functionality, including displaying, creating, updating, and voting on questions and answers.

The class manages interactions with the database for storing and retrieving questions, answers, votes, and reviews.

  • Constructor Details

    • QandAPage

      public QandAPage()
      Constructs a new QandAPage and initializes database connections. Connects to the database and initializes the necessary database helpers.

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user of the application.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to set as the current user

    • createScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene createScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Creates and returns the main scene for the Q and A page. Initializes all UI components, loads questions and reviews from the database, and sets up event handlers for buttons and other interactive elements.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to display the scene on
      Returns:
      A configured Scene object ready to be displayed

    • searchQuestionsByTrustedReviewer

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> searchQuestionsByTrustedReviewer()
      Searches for questions that have reviews by trusted reviewers. This method identifies questions that have been reviewed by users who are trusted by the current user.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of questions that have reviews by trusted reviewers

    • navigateToUserHomePage

      private void navigateToUserHomePage()
      Navigates back to the appropriate home page based on user's role. Routes the user to either the InstructorHomePage, UserHomePage, or ReviewerHomePage depending on their role.

    • loadQuestionsFromDatabase

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> loadQuestionsFromDatabase()
      Loads questions from the database and populates the questions list. If no questions exist in the database, creates and saves some default questions.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Question objects loaded from the database

    • loadReviewsFromDatabase

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Review> loadReviewsFromDatabase()
      Loads reviews from the database and populates the reviews list.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Review objects loaded from the database

    • promptForNewQuestion

      private void promptForNewQuestion(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Question> questionListView)
      Displays a dialog prompting the user to enter a new question. Validates the question and saves it to the database if valid.
      Parameters:
      questionListView - The ListView to update after adding a new question

    • promptForAnswer

      private void promptForAnswer(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Question> questionListView, int selectedIndex)
      Displays a dialog prompting the user to enter an answer to a question. Validates the answer and saves it to the database if valid.
      Parameters:
      questionListView - The ListView containing the question to answer
      selectedIndex - The index of the selected question in the ListView

    • promptForUpdatedQuestion

      private void promptForUpdatedQuestion(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Question> questionListView, Question question, int index)
      Displays a dialog prompting the user to update a question. Validates the updated question and saves it to the database if valid.
      Parameters:
      questionListView - The ListView containing the question to update
      question - The Question object to update
      index - The index of the question in the ListView

    • searchQuestions

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> searchQuestions(String searchTerm)
      Searches for questions and answers containing the specified search term.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The term to search for
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of questions matching the search criteria

    • showErrorMessage

      private void showErrorMessage(String title, String content)
      Displays an error message dialog with the specified title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the error dialog
      content - The content message to display in the dialog

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection when the application is shutting down. This should be called before exiting the application to ensure proper cleanup.
